where.if: AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE antiClass>0)
AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE antiClass=#{antiClass:INTEGER})
AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE base>0)
AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE base=#{base:INTEGER})
AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE mental=1)
AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE matchDrugID IN(SELECT drugID FROM Drug WHERE adjuvantDrug=1) )

choose.when: AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE dose = #{dose:VARCHAR})
AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE dose ='' OR dose IS NULL)

where.if: AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE chnName LIKE '$%{likeMedicineName}%')
AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE healthNo LIKE '${healthNo}%')
AND T.goodsID IN (SELECT goodsID FROM Medicine WHERE healthNo LIKE '${likeHealthNo}%')

mapper.select:
SELECT M.chnName,M.anticlass,M.spec,M.producer,M.dealer,M.base, A.amount,A.quantity FROM ( SELECT T.goodsID,sum(T.amount)amount ,sum(T.quantity) quantity FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T
GROUP BY goodsID HAVING sum(T.quantity)>0) A JOIN Medicine M ON M.goodsID=A.goodsID ORDER BY A.amount DESC

SELECT cast(dateStr AS DATETIME) date ,amount, number,quantity FROM (SELECT convert(VARCHAR(10),T.dispensingDate,120) AS dateStr,sum(T.amount)amount ,count(DISTINCT(T.goodsNo)) number, sum(T.quantity) quantity FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T
GROUP BY convert(VARCHAR(10),T.dispensingDate,120)) A ORDER BY dateStr

select T.department,sum(T.amount) amount,sum(case when M.base=1 then T.amount else 0 end ) base1Amount,sum(case when M.base=2 then T.amount else 0 end ) base2Amount, sum(case when M.base=3 then T.amount else 0 end ) base3Amount from ${DrugRecordsTable} T left join Medicine M on T.goodsID=M.goodsID
group by T.department order by sum(T.amount) desc

SELECT doctorID,doctorName, sum(T.amount) amount, sum(T.quantity) quantity, sum(case when adviceID=0 then amount else 0 end) clinicAmount, sum(case when adviceID>0 then amount else 0 end)hospitalAmount , sum(case when adviceID=0 and M.base>0 then amount else 0 end) clinicBaseAmount, sum(case when adviceID>0 and M.base>0 then amount else 0 end)hospitalBaseAmount FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T left join Medicine M on T.goodsID=M.goodsID
GROUP BY doctorID,doctorName ORDER BY sum(amount) DESC

SELECT M.goodsID,M.no,M.chnName,M.spec,M.producer,M.dealer,A.amount,A.quantity,M.dose,M.minUnit, case M.base when 1 then '基药' when 2 then '国基' when 3 then '省基' else '' end base, M.mental,M.minOfpack, A.topDepartment,A.topDoctor,A.patient FROM Medicine M, (SELECT T.goodsID,sum(T.amount) amount,sum(T.quantity) quantity,
stuff((select top 3 ','+department from ${DrugRecordsTable} where dispensingDate >= #{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} AND dispensingDate < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP} and goodsID=T.goodsID group by department order by sum(amount) desc FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') topDepartment, stuff((select top 3 ','+doctorName from ${DrugRecordsTable} where dispensingDate >= #{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} AND dispensingDate < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP} and goodsID=T.goodsID group by doctorName order by sum(amount) desc FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 1, '') topDoctor,
count(DISTINCT patientID) patient FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T LEFT JOIN rbac..Dict R ON R.name=T.department AND R.parentID=108
GROUP BY goodsID) A WHERE M.goodsID =A.goodsID ORDER BY A.amount DESC

SELECT doctorID,doctorName, sum(T.amount) amount, sum(T.quantity) quantity, sum(case when adviceID=0 then amount else 0 end) clinicAmount, sum(case when adviceID>0 then amount else 0 end)hospitalAmount , count(distinct case when adviceID=0 then patientID else null end) clinicPatient, count(distinct case when adviceID=0 and M.western!=4 then patientID else null end) clinicPatient2,/*门诊病人(西药)*/ count(distinct case when adviceID>0 then patientID else null end) hospitalPatient FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T left join Medicine M on T.goodsID=M.goodsID
GROUP BY doctorID,doctorName -- having sum(amount)>0 ORDER BY sum(amount) DESC

SELECT H.healthNo,H.chnName,B.amount,B.quantity FROM Health H, (SELECT left(M.healthNo,6)healthNo, sum(A.amount) amount,sum(A.quantity) quantity FROM Medicine M, (SELECT T.goodsNo,sum(T.amount) amount,sum(T.quantity) quantity FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T
GROUP BY T.goodsNo) A WHERE A.goodsNo=M.no GROUP BY left(M.healthNo,6)) B WHERE H.healthNo=B.healthNo ORDER BY B.amount DESC

SELECT A.patientName patientName,A.dispensingDate date,A.quantity quantity, A.unit,M.chnName,M.spec,A.drugstore FROM ( SELECT TOP ${limit} t.drID,T.patientName,T.dispensingDate, T.quantity,T.unit,T.goodsNo,T.drugstore FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T
AND t.drID < (SELECT min(lydmx_id) FROM (SELECT TOP ${start} t.drID FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T
ORDER BY t.drID DESC) A)
ORDER BY t.drID DESC ) A LEFT JOIN Medicine M ON A.goodsNo=M.no ORDER BY A.drID DESC

SELECT T.department department,sum(T.amount) amount,sum(T.quantity) quantity FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T
GROUP BY T.department ORDER BY sum(T.amount) DESC

SELECT cast(convert(VARCHAR(10), T.dispensingDate, 120) AS SMALLDATETIME) date, sum(T.amount) amount, sum(T.quantity) quantity FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T
GROUP BY convert(VARCHAR(10), T.dispensingDate, 120) order BY convert(VARCHAR(10), T.dispensingDate, 120)

SELECT count(DISTINCT T.goodsNo+T.dispensingNo) hospitalDrugNum, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN M1.base>0 THEN T.goodsNo+T.dispensingNo ELSE null END) hospitalBaseDrugNum, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN M1.insurance=1 THEN T.goodsNo+T.dispensingNo ELSE null END) hospitalInsuranceADrugNum, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN M1.insurance=2 THEN T.goodsNo+T.dispensingNo ELSE null END) hospitalInsuranceBDrugNum, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN M1.antiClass>0 THEN T.goodsNo+T.dispensingNo ELSE null END) hospitalAntiNum, count(DISTINCT T.dispensingNo ) hospitalPatient2, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN T.adviceType ='肌注静注' OR T.adviceType ='静滴' THEN T.dispensingNo ELSE null END) hospitalInjectPatient, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN M1.antiClass>0 AND (T.adviceType ='肌注静注' OR T.adviceType ='静滴') THEN T.dispensingNo ELSE null END) hospitalInjectAntiPatient FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T LEFT JOIN Medicine M1 ON T.goodsNo=M1.no
and adviceID>0

SELECT COUNT(distinct case when base=3 then T.goodsNo else null end) localBaseNum,sum(case when base=3 then amount else 0 end) localBaseMoney, COUNT(distinct case when base=2 then T.goodsNo else null end) nationBaseNum,sum(case when base=2 then amount else 0 end) nationBaseMoney FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T LEFT JOIN Medicine M1 ON T.goodsNo=M1.no

select department, sum(case when M.insurance != 3 then amount else 0 end) insuranceAmount, sum(amount) amount, case when sum(amount) < 0.0001 then 0 else sum(case when M.insurance != 3 then amount else 0 end)/sum(amount) end insuranceRatio, sum(case when adviceID = 0 then amount else 0 end) clinicAmount, sum(case when adviceID > 0 then amount else 0 end) hospitalAmount, count(distinct case when adviceID = 0 then patientID else null end) clinicPatient, count(distinct case when adviceID > 0 then patientID else null end) hospitalPatient from ${DrugRecordsTable} T LEFT JOIN Medicine M ON T.goodsID = M.goodsID where T.dispensingDate >= #{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} AND T.dispensingDate < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP} AND M.no=#{medicineNo:VARCHAR}) AND M.chnName LIKE '$%{likeMedicineName}%') group by department;

SELECT A.department,A.antiAmount,D.amount,CASE WHEN D.hospitalDay>0 THEN A.DDDs/D.hospitalDay ELSE 0 END AUD,A.clinicAntiPatient,A.DDDs,D.hospitalDay,D.hospitalPatient2, D.clinicPatient,D.clinicPatient2,CASE WHEN D.orderNum IS NOT null THEN D.orderNum ELSE 9999999 END orderNum FROM (SELECT department,sum(antiAmount)antiAmount,sum(clinicAntiPatient) clinicAntiPatient, sum(DDDs) DDDs FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN len(T.department)>3 and T.department not like '%产科%' THEN replace(T.department,'门诊','') ELSE T.department END department, sum(T.amount) antiAmount, sum(CASE WHEN len(T.dispensingNo)>=10 AND M1.ddd>0 THEN T.quantity*M1.contents/M1.ddd ELSE 0 END)*100.0 DDDs, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN len(T.dispensingNo) < 10 THEN T.invoiceNo ELSE null END) clinicAntiPatient FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T LEFT JOIN Medicine M1 ON T.goodsID=M1.goodsID WHERE T.dispensingDate >= #{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} AND T.dispensingDate < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP} AND M1.medicineNo=#{medicineNo:VARCHAR} AND M1.antiClass=#{antiClass:INTEGER} AND T.adviceType!='出院带药' AND T.adviceType!='其他' GROUP BY T.department)A GROUP BY department) A, (SELECT A.department,sum(A.clinicPatient)clinicPatient, sum(A.clinicPatient2)clinicPatient2, sum(A.hospitalDay)hospitalDay, sum(A.hospitalPatient2)outPatient,max(D.orderNum) orderNum,sum(A.clinicAmount+A.hospitalAmount)amount,sum(hospitalPatient2) hospitalPatient2 FROM DailyDepart A LEFT JOIN rbac..Dict D ON D.name=A.department WHERE A.date >= #{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} AND A.date < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY A.department) D WHERE A.department=D.department ORDER BY A.antiAMount DESC

SELECT M.no goodsID,M.price,M.chnName,M.antiClass,M.dose,M.spec,M.minUnit,A.clinicQuantity,A.hospitalQuantity,A.bringQuantity,A.total,A.clinicPatient,A.hospitalPatient,A.amount, case when M.ddd>0 then A.hospitalQuantity2*M.contents / M.ddd else 0 end DDDs FROM ( SELECT T.goodsID, sum(case when adviceID=0 then T.quantity else 0 end) clinicQuantity , sum(case when adviceID>0 and T.usage!='出院带药' then T.quantity else 0 end) hospitalQuantity, sum(case when T.usage='出院带药' then T.quantity else 0 end) bringQuantity, sum(T.quantity) total, sum(T.amount) amount, count(distinct case when adviceID=0 then T.patientID else null end) clinicPatient, count(distinct case when adviceID>0 then T.patientID else null end) hospitalPatient , SUM(CASE when adviceID>0 and T.usage!='出院带药' and T.usage!='其它' then T.quantity else 0 end)hospitalQuantity2 FROM ${DrugRecordsTable} T join Medicine M on M.goodsID=T.goodsID WHERE M.antiClass>=1 AND datepart(year,T.dispensingDate) =#{year:INTEGER} AND datepart(mm,T.dispensingDate) =#{month:INTEGER} AND datepart(qq,T.dispensingDate) =#{quarter:INTEGER} AND T.dispensingDate >= #{fromDate:VARCHAR} AND T.dispensingDate < #{toDate:VARCHAR} group by T.goodsID) A LEFT JOIN Medicine M on M.goodsID=A.goodsID order by a.amount desc
